title: Dear mum
creator_credit: Cinesound Movietone, Film Australia, Peter Johnson and Don Marley
brief_description: A highly entertaining and at times funny film about the life of a young soldier in the army. He writes to tell his mum all the great things that happen in the army - like seeing the country; friendship; a lot of spare time and the satisfaction from working as a group.
